mapper.select: select stock_out.*,contract.name as contractName,customer.name as customerName,storehouse.name as storehouseName from stock_out LEFT JOIN contract ON stock_out.contractId=contract.id LEFT JOIN storehouse ON stock_out.storehouseId=storehouse.id LEFT JOIN customer ON contract.customerId=customer.id where stock_out.appId=#{appId} order by stock_out.id desc
